phrs.translation: 诉讼委托人, 当事人, 及时行乐, 安恬
及时行乐, 活在当下, 卡帕蒂姆, 姬阿奕
逐日, 每日, 日复一日
择优解除约款, 翻译
按日津贴, 每日津贴, 翻译

sentences.sentence: He agreed to pay at specified rates per diem.
sentences.translation: 他同意每天按规定的数额付款。

sentences.sentence: He received a per diem allowance to cover his travel expenses.
sentences.translation: 他收到一笔按日计算的差旅费用补贴。

sentences.sentence: He will get $14 000 a year in per diem to help with the higher costs of living in Washington.
sentences.translation: 他每年将得到14 000元的日补贴，以弥补华盛顿较高的生活费。
